00028 #ifndef __StringSerialiser_H__
00029 #define __StringSerialiser_H__
00030 
00031 #include <OgrePrerequisites.h>
00032 
00033 namespace Ogre{
00034 
00036     class StringSerialiser
00037     {
00038     private:
00039         char *mBuffer;
00040         size_t mBufferSize, mTotalSize;
00041     public:
00043         StringSerialiser(size_t size = 0);
00044         ~StringSerialiser();
00045 
00047         String str() const;
00048 
00049         StringSerialiser &operator << (const char *str);
00050         StringSerialiser &operator << (const String &str);
00051         StringSerialiser &operator << (char val);
00052         StringSerialiser &operator << (short val);
00053         StringSerialiser &operator << (int val);
00054         StringSerialiser &operator << (unsigned char val);
00055         StringSerialiser &operator << (unsigned short val);
00056         StringSerialiser &operator << (unsigned int val);
00057         StringSerialiser &operator << (float val);
00058         StringSerialiser &operator << (double val);
00059     private:
00060         void growBuffer(size_t n);
00061     };
